item.title: Hiring Data Engineer (Go, GCP, SQL, Python). Remote OK.
item.description:
Paperchain is an early-stage startup building real-time revenue forecasting and financial tools for the digital media industry using unique applications of data science and blockchain technology.

Weâ€™re looking for a Data Engineer to come in and help build our data pipeline foundations at Paperchain. This is a contractor role with the plan to transition into a full-time role. The core team functions remotely with HQ being in New York and our CTO in Berlin.
